# PlantUML and Graphviz compatibility

PlantUML may give unexpected results on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 or its derivatives, which have graphviz 2.30.1 by default .

## PlantUML code
    ```puml
    skinparam shadowing false
    (C) -right-> (E)
    ```

## Results
Since version 1.2018.4, PlantUML seems to ignore horizontal links in `GraphvizVersionFinder.getVersion()` where graphviz version is 2.30.
```puml
!$OK = ""
!$NG = ""

title
|= PlantUML |= Graphviz |= Result|
| 1.2018.3 | 2.30.1 | <img src="data:image/png;base64,$OK"> |
| 1.2018.3 | 2.38.0 | <img src="data:image/png;base64,$OK"> |
| 1.2018.4 | 2.30.1 | <img src="data:image/png;base64,$NG"> |
| 1.2018.4 | 2.38.0 | <img src="data:image/png;base64,$OK"> |
end title
```

## Note
Another version of graphviz can be used with the environment variable `GRAPHVIZ_DOT`.

```
$ export GRAPHVIZ_DOT=/Opt/graphviz-2.38.0/bin/dot
```
